definition: to draw out/to pull out from in between/to remove part of the whole/(of certain plants) to sprout or bud/to whip or thrash
to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody

sentences.english: Reassigns 40 cadre to establish the leading group office.
sentences.chinese: 抽调40名干部成立领导小组办公室。

sentences.english: The big clubs siphon off all the best players.
sentences.chinese: 大俱乐部把所有最佳选手都抽调走了。

definition: to dispatch (sb) in an official capacity/to be posted (as an ambassador, foreign correspondent etc)
to go to war/to engage in war
to start out on a trip/to dispatch troops
to select/to detail/to set apart/to appoint
to expand (esp. by new recruitment)/to increase the army/to augment
